nodes.text: Just Armor was a shop located in the market of the space station StarForge Station, in the StarForge Nebula. Just Armor was a store that sold personal and starship armor, as well as passive defenses, for fifty-percent over list price. Although some of its stock was new, the majority of the store's goods were used. A pair of Humans ran Just Armor in 0 ABY: Gjaddia was the business man, while Morol took care of the armor fittings that customers requested.

Just Armor first appeared in Preparing for War, an adventure scenario from 1998's The Far Orbit Project, by Timothy S. O'Brien. The book was a supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game and was a sequel of sorts to the previous publication, Pirates & Privateers, carrying on that book's theme by following the privateering vessel Far Orbit. The shop is provided as an example of the stores in the market that players can shop at when the Far Orbit goes to StarForge Station.
